name: Hilton Columbus at Easton

reviews.text: We were in town on business and decided to stay at The Hilton at Easton. The stay overall was excellent and the reviews were accurate on tripadvisor. Service was top notch (with the exception of not being acknowledged of Gold Status upon arrival), and the staff was talkative and professional whenever we interacted with them. What I didn't expect was the dated look and feel of the hallways, rooms, and executive lounge. The gym and pool area was Excellent! There is a seperate gym for cardio and for weights. We would return and love to stay here on our next trip to Columbus. Top Notch!
reviews.title: Pleasant first stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a typical Hilton property with a clean, sleek appearance but, as with most hotels in the Hilton chain, in our opinion, had a somewhat chilly ambience. The front desk personnel were exceedingly friendly and helpful. Our room was well-appointed and clean but lacked a separate sink outside the bathroom. The hotel is well-located in the center of the popular Easton Town Center, which is loaded with quality shops, a cinema (try the Cinema Suites for a laid back (literally) movie experience with a good menu), and fine dining.
reviews.title: An upscale property

reviews.text: My husband, three kids, and I drive every other weekend 100 miles one way to stay at the Hilton at Easton. It is always a wonderful experience and we have stayed there multiple times. We have all of 2013 booked and are looking forward to every trip. Room service and dining is excellent and we are looking forward to the Sunday Brunch on our upcoming trip. The rooms are always in top shape and super clean. My husband and I look forward to the hot shower and comfy king bed every time. We request an Easton View and always get it. Customer Service is superior and check in / out is always fast and friendly. Saturday my 7 year old daughter and I went to the lobby to enjoy the warm fire and live music. The Lobby and dining room are exquisite and never fail to impress us after our road trip. We look forward to our next trip by crossing off the days between trips. The Easton view never lets us down and is just beautiful at night.
reviews.title: Always an excellent stay at Hilton at Easton

reviews.text: Hilton Easton was very nice with comfortable accommodations and friendly, helpful staff. Very clean room and hotel. Great lobby for relaxing. Location is perfect right in the heart of the beautiful Easton Town Center.
reviews.title: great accommodations and location

reviews.text: Professionalism, organization, and easy to access business lounge and concierge service made what would have been a stressful stay, an absolute delight. The surrounding area is beautiful and I can't wait to return and actually ENJOY the area!
reviews.title: Organized, calming experience

reviews.text: I have stayed at the Hilton Columbus at Easton for the past 12 years for the OATCCC Track & Field Clinic. The hotel stay has always been a great experience! There are good resturaunts in the area to choose from.
reviews.title: Great stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first time staying at the Hilton at Easton. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. Check-in is very quick, valet parking is speedy. There are tons of restaurants and shipping within walking distance. The room itself was nice but the walls are very "thin". It sounded as if people walking in the halls were right in our room. Overall however we had a very nice stay.
reviews.title: Overnight Stay

reviews.text: The Hilton Easton near Columbus, Ohio is a good hotel for business travellers. The lobby is clean and spacious with a couple of bars, a restaurant and lots of seating.
reviews.title: Hilton Easton for business

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was spacious and very clean. The Easton shopping and restaurants just across the street were convenient. The Ocean Club restaurant was pretty good for a business dinner and the Northstar Cafe in the shopping area was good as well.
reviews.title: Nice weekend

reviews.text: We stayed here for two nights. When arriving it was impossible to find a parking space, they have a huge parking lot but people going to Easton can park in their lot too. You would think the Hilton would assign certain spaces for hotel guest only. The few spaces they did have assigned were valet parking only. Check in was qucik and easy. Our room was nice, very roomy with a nice sofa, comfy chair, desk and chair, nice size flat screen tv and the bed was comfortable. Bath room was good size and very clean. Everyone that works there is very friendly and helpful. Overall besides the parking, this hotel is very nice. Valet is 10 bucks a day, which isnt bad.
reviews.title: HIlton

reviews.text: I have been traveling to Columbus for weekend getaways for years and always prefer to stay at the Hilton at Easton. The rooms are beautiful, the staff very friendly and helpful the food and bars are top notch. I have stayed there with my children, co-workers, friends and last weekend a puppy. I was thrilled to discovery they were pet friendly - the staff were as helpful with the puppy as they were with any other guest. What really put this trip over the top was when we wanted to stay another night the manager was able to get us into a room at the last minute even though the hotel had been fuly booked according to the Hilton reservations system.
reviews.title: Great getaway

reviews.text: We are staying at the Hilton Hotel by Easton Town Center and everything is great. The beds are comfy and the hotel itself is decorated beautifully for the holidays. There are so many great stores just up the street and the restaurant choices are plentiful. We try to come to this area at least once a year and might possibly consider visiting in the warmer months. Lots to see and do. We will be back!
reviews.title: Hilton at Easton is Fabulous

reviews.text: Excellent hotel. Very large facility. Centrally located in the heart of Easton. Convenient to the mall and walking distance to several restaurants. My only complaint is the lack of elevators. Only 2 to service 7 floors. Thus, wait time can take several minutes. Overall, a great place to stay.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel during a large conference. It has a perfect location. Within walking distance to many restaurants and shopping. The front desk staff is very friendly. The breakfast buffet delicious. My only complaint is the wireless accessibility at the conference. It was hit or miss whether it worked or not. Other than that, a great hotel.
reviews.title: Great conference hotel

reviews.text: I planned a special annual luncheon reunion with colleagues and friends. We met at the Easton Hilton Hotel (Dining Room) in Columbus, OH on a Saturday.
reviews.title: Dining Room offers tasty options & lovely ambiance

reviews.text: Lovely Hilton in Columbus. Great sports bar with a good beer selection. Hotel seems older, but with some recent renovations(bathroom fixtures seem old, but has a flat screen TV)
reviews.title: Nicer Hilton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nearby lots of shops and places to eat, you can even walk to them
reviews.title: Great location, upscale Hilton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night on a weekend. The Hilton has the best hotel location at Easton if you are planning to visit the Town Center. Everything is within walking distance. The hotel was decorated very nice for Christmas during our stay. The rooms are very nice, clean and well maintained. The bathroom was especially spacious and the water pressure in the shower was fantastic. The only negative things I would say about our stay are that the mattress was not the most comfortable and the walls are thin. We could clearly hear people in the next room and in the hallways late at night. The staff was pleasant and the breakfast buffet had a large selection of food. There is plenty of parking in the front lot or in the adjacent garage. There is no need for a car once you are checked in as there are numerous restaurants and entertainment options close by. You may pay a bit more to stay at this location than other lodging options, but it is money well spent for the convenience.
reviews.title: Excellent service on our wedding night!

reviews.text: We stayed at this Hilton after getting married on the 22nd. Everyone was extremely friendly and the room was very nice and clean. Also, Sunday brunch is delicious and well worth the price!
reviews.title: Great hotel, cute center!

reviews.text: I'd like to thank the hotel for upgrading our room, too!
reviews.title: Beautiful

aka: Hilton Columbus At Easton Hotel Columbus
description: The Hilton Columbus at Easton is a AAA 4-Diamond, full service, upscale, smoke-free hotel. Easton's thriving corporate and retail centers make the Hilton Easton the perfect location. A world of excitement awaits just outside. Wander down cobbled walkways to the old-fashioned square. There are more than 100 shops, restaurants and entertainment. It's all just steps from the Hilton Columbus at Easton and it's unforgetable!
